extendedInfo.description: After the successful 1,500,000 downloads of Download Everything Pro, here comes the amazing new app - Download Everything Next. This app is a handy downloading utility that lets you Search and Download/listen all the indexed 4Shared files. Millions of people around the world share their files over 4shared each day. This app is a handy tool for downloading these files. The app is future glimpse of the pro version.The best part of this app is that it lets you download 4shared files in minimum possible steps. With this app it takes only 2 taps for you to get any shared file you want. No final downloading page, no waiting time. Plus it has resume capability which lets you pause downloads, or resume interrupted ones. The app has a cool Auto Resume feature that automatically tries to resume downloads on network interrupts. Once you start a download, it has minimum probability of getting interrupted on network breakdowns.4Shared is the house of millions Shared Audio files, Video files, Archives, Apps, EBooks, and numerous other shared files. With this app all these files can be pulled in your phone with a breeze. The app has an in built Music Player that lets you stream any music without bothering of downloading it. You can create your online playlist and bookmark favorite songs in it for playing live. But you are not constrained to stream shared music alone, with a single tap any music file can be downloaded for offline playing .These files can then be transferred to other media devices or can be shared by others. Do check out the amazing "Groovy Circle" Visualization of music player from options menu - it is just awesome (visualizer is available only in android version 2.3 and above). And when you download a file, or listen your favorite shared music, and find the file recommendable for others, it lets you comment and like the file. So if you like a shared file, you can tell others about it by commenting.Based on user comments and likes, the app has a Top Downloads section which lets you get files that are liked by most of the users .This lets you explore the world of shared files in an amazing way.(rating is supported only on devices with android version 2.3 and above; devices with non-LDPI screens)So what are you waiting for, Go! Give this app a shot and youâll definitely find the app worth staying on your phone.Please do comment about the app. Good/Bad both comments help us grow in their own way. With bug reports, weâll be able to remove errors quicklyOnly shared files on 4shared.com are available.***the application and its developers have no business relations with 4shared.com and no logo of the same are used in the app.

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: You can get just about anything on here. The best part is, you can get tons of apps free that you usually have to pay for! I\'ve saved about $100 with this app!
reviews.author: William Jones

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I think the search to be little bit more specific so we don\'t have to go through all the other crap to see what we want. other than that I think it\'s my favorite 1 yet
reviews.author: Nathan Albright

reviews.title: kool
reviews.comment: este app esta super cool t da toda la musica k kieres por eso doy las sinko estrellas
reviews.author: Ana Hernandez

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Good good good
reviews.author: istiak islam

reviews.title: Error!!
reviews.comment: I had to change the rating because when I try to download a app, it keeps on giving me a error.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is an amazing app. Finds almost everythng! But the only drawback is that it cannot resume a download. Fix it,and i\'ll give it a perfect 5!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great concept, problem executing
reviews.comment: Droid RAZR Max HD. When searching, I get maybe 8-10 results that I can scroll through before the app shuts down. If the file I\'m after isn\'t in the top ten, I\'m out of luck. Sent report but so far no response after 2 days. If fixed, I\'ll give higher rating. If not, I\'ll give lower rating. Has been four weeks with no response.
reviews.author: Mike Tackmier

reviews.title: Nice utility
reviews.comment: It has been pretty good so far.. The interface can be a bit more intuitive. Otherwise it will be a 5 star app. Very useful for folks like me who download required stuff directly :)
reviews.author: Raj Vuppaladhadiam

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: I find basically everything! Best part would be that i don\'t have to pay for apps anymore (:
reviews.author: Chris O\'Brien

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: This app more interesting than the old version . .but both function really great.not waste to download.. good job~
reviews.author: iqa Pinky

reviews.title: doesn\'t really understand fiction authors or books
reviews.comment: I\'ve been able to download non-fiction ebooks, but it doesn\'t recognise fiction, authors or books... and doesn\'t read 4shared for them - I can find the books it doesn\'t recognise on google search. Why is that, Rahul?  Still, its fast when it does get your search words, good job.:)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: easy to use
reviews.comment: great tool.  only thing I can think that would make it better is if their was a way now what language the item like movies are in before its downloaded.   some do say some does not.    thanks for a great app!
reviews.author: Bryan Jenkins

reviews.title: Still good
reviews.comment: Had this since about the end of last year; downloads were easy to find in the begging, now I can hardly find any that work. I am grateful because every once and a while I can find something, but overall, its just ok. not the best, not the worst.
reviews.author: indigo hamilton

reviews.title: Tuoyo
reviews.comment: This is a real great application as it can search out and download any file. Using it has really made my day it is without hesitation that it\'s getting a five-star from me.
reviews.author: Afe Emmanuel

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: All it ever says is connection error, or oops can not complete task. Deleting this hunk of s***

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: How can you give this app for free? Now I can download almost everything that I had to pay for! I thank u Rahul Verma!

reviews.title: Best app of its kind!
reviews.comment: This app is easy and fun. Who knows what you\'ll download.

reviews.comment: Good interface, clean white pages, fast downloads... M just luvin it.. Best app....!
